mapper.update: UPDATE register_detail SET score= #{score}, completeyn='y' WHERE rdseq= #{rdseq}
mapper.select:
SELECT s.name sname, s.id sid, d.name dname, s.dseq, sub.name subname, sub.sseq, d.score, d.completeyn, d.rdseq FROM student s, department d, subject sub, register_detail d, register r WHERE s.id=#{sid} AND d.completeyn ='y'
AND s.dseq = d.dseq AND s.id = r.id AND r.rseq = d.rseq AND d.sseq = sub.sseq

SELECT s.name sname , s.id sid ,d.score, d.rdseq, sub.sseq FROM student s, register r, subject sub , register_detail d WHERE sub.sseq = #{sseq}
AND r.rseq = d.rseq AND s.id = r.id AND sub.sseq = d.sseq
SELECT s.sseq, s.name subname, d.name dname, s.time FROM subject s, department d WHERE id = #{pid} AND s.dseq = d.dseq
SELECT s.sseq, s.name subname, d.name dname, s.time FROM subject s, department d WHERE s.id=#{pid} AND s.name LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%' AND s.dseq = d.dseq ORDER BY s.name

SELECT p.name pname, s.name subname, d.score as score, de.name dname FROM subject s, register_detail d, student t, register r, professor p, department de WHERE t.id = #{pid} AND d.completeyn = 'y' AND t.id = r.id AND r.rseq = d.rseq AND s.sseq = d.sseq AND s.id = p.id AND s.dseq = de.dseq
